interface.description:
utility: Class noncopyable plus checked_delete(), checked_array_delete(), next(), prior() function templates, plus base-from-member idiom.
utility/call_traits: Defines types for passing parameters.
utility/compressed_pair: Empty member optimization.
utility/enable_if: Selective inclusion of function template overloads.
utility/in_place_factories: Generic in-place construction of contained objects with a variadic argument-list.
utility/operators: Templates ease arithmetic classes and iterators.
utility/result_of: Determines the type of a function call expression.
utility/swap: Enhanced generic swap function.
utility/value_initialized: Wrapper for uniform-syntax value initialization, based on the original idea of David Abrahams.
